message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. 60/40 split seems reasonable for the first round.
Alice, let's be realistic. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor. Take this opportunity before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Bob, your offer was tempting, but I think we can still find a fairer middle ground. Let's try a 55/45 split my way this time.
Alice, this back-and-forth isn't getting us anywhere. I'm offering a slight edge for myself at 51/49.  Let's be sensible and end this before inflation eats further into our shares.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I need a bit more to agree. This is a 52/48 split - my way -  showing you're getting a better deal than your last offer.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We're losing serious money with each refusal. Let's be adults and split it 50/50 before we both end up with nothing.
